description: The Shorey Series of boardshorts are they elastic waist, above the knee, ultimate kick back trunks, made for ideal comfort from a recycled polyester/hemp blend. The Shorey Sierra Madre celebrates the fabled Sierra Madre de Oaxaca mountain range where the Roark crew began this season’s journey, weaving through tiny, traditional villages on motorbike, sampling mezcals in hidden festivals perched in towns above the clouds.
name: Roark Shorey Sierra Madre Boardshorts, 18" Inseam - Mens
